text: The Grove Square cappuccino is like a "comfort food" to me.  It is much like oneI get from a local ice cream parlor, the drink is comforting and relaxing, good for releasing stress at a time when that is extremely high in my life.  A good way to start a busy day for extra pep, yet a good "slow down" in the late afternoon or early evening when I need to let go of "life" and rest.
